titleStmt.title: Truth & innocency triumphing over falshood [and] envy, or Jasper Batt's vindication against William Roger's un-christian [sic] and false insinuations, in his book mis-called The Christian Quaker, &c.
titleStmt.author: Batt, Jasper, d. 1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Bringhurst, printer and stationer, at the sign of the Book in Grace-Church-Street,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Rogers, William. The Christian Quaker.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends' House Library, London.
